text: Joseph Simeone was judge on the Supreme Court of Missouri from 1978 until 1979. Previously, Judge Simeone was the Chief Judge of the Missouri Court of Appeals for the Eastern District. Shortly after his appointment to the Supreme Court of Missouri, he was appointed to a position within the Social Security Administration, as an Administrative Law Judge. ==Education== B.S., Saint Louis University LL.B., Washington University in St. Louis School of Law LL.M., University of Michigan Law School S.J.D., University of Michigan Law School ==Sources== Category:Judges of the Supreme Court of Missouri Category:University of Michigan Law School alumni
title: Joseph J. Simeone
